isis.stitle: SPRING ASSEMBLIES AND SHOCK ABSORBERS - INSTALL

svcproc.title: INSTALL
svcproc.para: The exact installation procedures will vary for each type of spring. A general guideline follows:

step1.para: Before assembling the spring, clean and lubricate all the hardware. Most often the pivoting end of the spring should be fastened to the bracket first. Then align the shackle end to the other spring bracket.
Using floor jack, raise axle assembly enough to align center bolt head into axle housing spring pad guide hole.
When installing the U-bolts to the axles, do not final-tighten the retaining nuts to values specified in the TORQUE CHART until you have put the springs under normal load.
Spring failures may occur at the center bolt if the U-bolt nuts are loose. Retighten these bolts at the intervals specified under MAINTENANCE .
